item.author: baguette
item.description: Challenge Description This challenge, authored by @baguette, involves exploiting an integer overflow vulnerability combined with a stack overflow, allowing arbitrary writes to the stack. Vulnerability Overview ðŸ›‘ Vulnerability: The vulnerability lies in the improper handling of integer values and the use of the read function, which allows writing arbitrary data to the stack. Exploitation Process 1. Triggering the Integer Overflow: When len is set to -2147483648 (minimum value of a signed 32-bit integer), the call to abs(len) results in an overflow.
